channel.title: Stories on JordanTheITGuy
channel.description: Recent content in Stories on JordanTheITGuy

item.title: Rural Internet in the USA
item.description: The Digital Divde in Rural America is more than just a news story This blog post has been a long time coming. I feel an obligation here to inform any regular readers I have if you are expecting a technology post, this isn’t it. One additional warning, this post will get a little bit into my personal life story. Some important history To understand how I ended up in the spot I’m in today there are some key things to know about my past.
